mapper.sql: EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_ID, EDU_ARTICLE.TITLE, EDU_ARTICLE.SUMMARY, EDU_ARTICLE.IMAGE_URL, EDU_ARTICLE.SOURCE, EDU_ARTICLE.AUTHOR, EDU_ARTICLE.CREATE_TIME, EDU_ARTICLE.PUBLISH_TIME, EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_TYPE, EDU_ARTICLE.CLICK_NUM, EDU_ARTICLE.PRAISE_COUNT, EDU_ARTICLE.COMMENT_NUM, EDU_ARTICLE.SORT
mapper.update: UPDATE EDU_ARTICLE SET EDU_ARTICLE.TITLE=#{title}, EDU_ARTICLE.SUMMARY=#{summary}, EDU_ARTICLE.IMAGE_URL=#{imageUrl}, EDU_ARTICLE.SOURCE=#{source}, EDU_ARTICLE.CLICK_NUM=#{clickNum}, EDU_ARTICLE.AUTHOR=#{author}, EDU_ARTICLE.PUBLISH_TIME=#{publishTime}, EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_TYPE=#{type}, EDU_ARTICLE.SORT=#{sort} WHERE EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_ID=#{articleId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EDU_ARTICLE WHERE EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_ID IN (${value})
DELETE FROM EDU_ARTICLE_CONTENT WHERE EDU_ARTICLE_CONTENT.ARTICLE_ID IN (${value})
mapper.select: SELECT EDU_ARTICLE_CONTENT.CONTENT FROM EDU_ARTICLE_CONTENT WHERE EDU_ARTICLE_CONTENT.ARTICLE_ID =#{value}

SELECT FROM EDU_ARTICLE WHERE
AND EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_ID <#{articleId} ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC
AND EDU_ARTICLE.ARTICLE_ID >#{articleId} ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID ASC
LIMIT 1
